mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (username, password, avatar, phone, email, gender, status, createTime, updateTime) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, COALESCE(#{avatar}, 'https://img.88icon.com/download/jpg/20201226/9d64c2d320c079cbd4f38f10e066dc71_512_512.jpg!bg'), #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
